Text: Leading Industry Firm releases ERCOT Electricity Price Forecast Study A New Market Takes ShapeDue to the rescheduled ERCOT Market Trials Henwood will be hosting its ERC OT PMA Workshop on Wednesday June th instead of Tuesday June th ERC OT at the Crossroads A New Market Takes Shape Wednesday June am pm Hyatt Regency Downtown Houston Houston TX A team of He nwood regional power market specialists will be presenting the latest analy sis and information to assist you in the ERCOT Power Market in addition to an analysis of the issues now playing out in the WSCC markets Registrati on and breakfast will begin at AM and the program will run until PM Lunch will also be provided Agenda topics include Wholesale gene ration outlook and how to make a profit in the future overbuilt ERCOT marke t How will market restructuring impact mid to longterm wholesale prices What are the new analytical tools available to capture market volatilit y and uncertainty impacts to your supply contracts and generation assets What are the restructuring lessons learned from the California experience and the implications to ERCOT How can you learn to develop profitable op erations in the ERCOT market How can Internet based eBusiness tools hel p identify and track power plant activity in ERCOT How valuable is it to you to know the operational data of your competitors on an hourly basic I n conjunction with this program Henwood will have a demonstration room ava ilable to present its latest software applications and ebusiness solutions A registration fee is required to reserve a space in the workshop To reserve space now please register online at wwwhenwoodenergycomhtm leventshtml Limited space is available so make sure to register early We will have a drawing for a new PDA at PM during lunch and the winne r must be present Please review the agenda online and feel free to call me directly if you have any questions or need additional information about th e ERCOT Workshop Hope to see you Houston on the th of June Sincerely Mark G Foster Director Strategic Advisory Services Ext
